metadata.title: CVE-2024-26649 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: Fix the null pointer when load rlc firmware If the RLC firmwareis invalid because of wrong header size, the pointer to the rlc firmware isreleased in function amdgpu_ucode_request. There will be a null pointererror in subsequent use. So skip validation to fix it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
